name: 2nd Edition of Global Conference on Physical Medicine And Rehabilitation
content: Conference Full Name: 2nd Edition of Global Conference on Physical Medicine And Rehabilitation Conference Short Name: GCPR 2024 | Hybrid Event Conference Theme: “REHAB: Reinvestigating and Exploring the Happenings and Advancements for the Betterment of Physical Medicine Research” Conference Venue: Madrid, Spain Conference Address: Rafaelhoteles Atocha C. de Méndez Álvaro, 30, 28045 Madrid, Spain Event Mode: Hybrid Event: both onsite and online versions / Virtual Reach us at: Contact Email: physical-medicine@magnusconference.com Phone: +1 (702) 988-2320 WhatsApp: +1 7794292143 Dates: September 09-11, 2024 Venue: Madrid, Spain Website: https://physical-medicine.magnusconferences.com/ Abstract submission: https://physical-medicine.magnusconferences.com/submit-abstract Registration: https://physical-medicine.magnusconferences.com/register Social Media Link: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PhysicalMedRehabilitationConference Twitter: https://twitter.com/GCPR\_Event LinkedIn: YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLtH0EIiRfFWaIOwuYL5IEw Organiser: Magnus Group LLC - https://www.magnusgroup.org/ Conference Manager: Organiser Address: Magnus Group LLC 150 South Wacker Drive #2400 Chicago, IL 60606, USA
